answers.answer: Since it is a child..IF he has diabetes..it will be type 1.  Type 2 is acquired as an adult or older teen with weight issues.  You need to get him to the doctor to be checked out.  If he does have diabetes...the sooner the better to learn about it.  Good luck in helping your son.
do we get high blodd sugar values just after exercise?(for a norbal beig too..?)

question: my 3 yr child showed blood sugar  level of 450 four months ago in an eve tyme....i checked it due to his frequent thirst during heavy rainy days..and pee...is it type one or two?he didnt show any symptom before that..then after the values exceeded normal value.now by controlling food habit it is normal.but if he changes his food it shows large values.is it curable?i am totally nervous now..
title: is it curable?
